mapper.sql:
select course_detail.id, course_detail.semester, teacher_number, teacher.real_name as teacherName, course_number, course.name as courseName, course.type, course.icon_url, course.description, course.period, course.credit, classroom_number, classroom.location as classroomName, day_of_the_week, scheduling_time
from course_detail left join teacher on course_detail.teacher_number = teacher.number left join classroom on course_detail.classroom_number = classroom.number left join course on course_detail.course_number = course.number
mapper.select:
select course_detail.id, course_detail.semester, teacher_number, teacher.real_name as teacherName, course_detail.course_number, course.name as courseName, course.type, course.icon_url, course.description, course.period, course.credit, classroom_number, classroom.location as classroomName, day_of_the_week, scheduling_time
from specialty left join specialty_course on specialty.number = specialty_course.specialty_number left join course on specialty_course.course_number = course.number left join course_detail on course.number = course_detail.course_number left join teacher on course_detail.teacher_number = teacher.number left join classroom on course_detail.classroom_number = classroom.number where specialty.number = #{specialtyNumber} and course_detail.semester = #{semseter} and course.type = #{courseType}
